value.name: Regional commission panel recommends Jeremy Holmes for top job
value.description: If approved, Holmes would succeed Wayne Strickland as executive director of the Roanoke Valley-Alleghancy Regional Commission.

value.name: Fall River Shooting Suspect Now Charged With Murder
value.description: Charges against an 18-year-old man already arrested in connection with last week's double homicide in Fall River have now been upgraded to murder.

value.name: Murder charges filed against suspect in Fall River double homicide

value.name: Fall River Teen Arrested In Connection With Double Murder
value.description: A Fall River teen has been arrested in connection with a shooting that killed a 14-year-old boy and 29-year-old man earlier this week. The Bristol County District Attorney’s Office said 18-year-old Jeremy Holmes was arrested Friday night at the Boston Marriott Hotel in Burlington.

value.name: Griffin Park shooting suspect held without bail
value.description: RIVER, MASS (WLNE) – 18-year-old Jeremy Holmes was charged in District Court on Monday in connection to a double homicide last week. The judge sentenced him to be held without bail until another hearing on Thursday.

value.name: Arrest Made in Fall River Shooting That Left 2 Dead, Including 14-Year-Old
value.description: Authorities have arrested an 18-year-old man in connection with a triple shooting Tuesday near a park in Fall River, Massachusetts, that left two people dead, including a 14-year-old boy. Jeremy Holmes was taken into custody Friday night at the Boston Marriott Hotel in Burlington,
